greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Fixed point starting with 0 of the morphism 0->01, 1->101.
comment: Is this a shifted version of A114986 or A096270? - _R. J. Mathar_, May 16 2011

Response:  A189479(n)=A114986(n-1) for n>=2; this follows from formulas at A099267 (the positions of 1 in A189479) and the fact that A114986 is the characteristic function of the lower Wythoff sequence with 0 prefixed. - _Clark Kimberling_, May 22 2011
link: Index entries for sequences that are fixed points of mappings
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Apr 22 2011
